title: This champion has self peel, a ms steroid, an ad steroid, and ranged autos.

replies.body:
Ah yes, Janna autos.

Second only to bananas as the deadliest thing in bot lane.

does she have 2 AD steroid, %max hp true damage and stealth too?

too bad
I thought this post was about vayne until i realized this reply is about vayne.
I thought trIst lol 2 self peels and attack speed steroid
Umm you take her ad and see what happens if you think she is op.
Janna is a beast...unless she's alone.

We knew that, but for other reasons (flying champions do not need boots), but she actually is right just under the "needs-a-nerf" line so likely she will not be nerfed since she is technically balanced.
